title: 122: Breaking into scouting, Week 4 NFL & CFB Talk
itunes:title: 122: Breaking into scouting, Week 4 NFL & CFB Talk
description:
Former NFL scouts Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks discuss how they began their careers in football and offer advice for those looking to get into scouting. The guys are then preview and predict the upcoming slate of Week 4 NFL games as well as their college football picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
